title: Hextech chest won't open!!!
body:
Hi, i just bought like 10 chests and when i right click on the chest in the loot menu and then press open chest nothing happens. I have all the keys that followed the purchase? What is wrong? In the lower left corner there's no open chest button like there used to be? 

Please help just spend like 10 euro!

replies.body: Your connection might be having some hiccups and failing to reach the hextech service, so it can't process transactions or load assets.  Give your pc a restart, and if it continues the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help clear up any snags.
